body.name: Dresser for Bedroom, Storage Drawers, Skinny Fabric Storage Tower with 4 Drawers, Tower Organizer Unit, Chest of Drawers with Wooden Top for Closet, Nursery, Laundry, Living Room, Hallway, Entryway
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 8 hrs 49 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Multifunction Dresser】Use stylish storage organizers to find endless organizational possibilities. Just place this clothing storage in the closet to offer a home for workout gear, blankets; place it in the nursery as a kids dresser to store baby clothes and baby stuff; place it in the entryway for storage saving unit for frequently used items.

【Large Capacity】This dresser offers sufficient space for daily necessities such as books, toys, etc. 4 large drawers are to satisfy various storage needs. The shelves are perfect for lamps, clocks without worrying about dropping. It works well in small areas while providing plenty of storage space, and mixes & matches with storage dressers or chest of drawers for a unique home style.

【Durable Material】This tall dresser is made of cationic materials, all other sides and gaps are made of high-quality breathable and non-woven synthetic fiber, harmless and wear-resistant, suitable for kids, teens and adults. Easy-pull drawers for smooth sliding and closing. For easy cleaning, just wipe with damp cloth and get it air-dried.

【Quality Construction】This fabric dresser combines water-resistant MDF board with a durable steel frame, make it sturdy under load 44 lb. Anti-tipping accessories are also equipped to prevent accidents.

【Easy to Assemble】The packages will come with all the tools and accessories for quick assembly, which allows only about 20 minutes to assemble your storage drawers with detailed instructions and the installation video. If you have encountered any problems, we would be delighted to help you find a solution and reply to your email within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars surprisingly impressed, roomy, pretty
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a temporary solution to a storage issue. It is way roomier than I thought it would be. It was super easy to assemble, looks great and is sturdy! The drawers slide in and out easily. The printing on the front was a surprise, but its cool. I use it for organizing crafts, junk drawer, important papers and a router stand/ Alexa pedestal in the living room. I feel i got way more than my moneys worth!! Will be buying a second one for socks and unders in my closet!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My at home teacher supplies - laminator, electric hole punch, folders, etc - needed a real home (the box under the chair had met its end and the chair was being rehomed) Enter this storage unitIt was simple to put together, took me about 20 minutes and holds everything I needed it to (and more). The unit is very lightweight and easy to move around once assembled. The drawers slide in and out with ease and it has a clean look. I was amazed at how much I was able to load into each drawer. I’m not sure it would withstand daily use the way I have it loaded, but if it was full of lightweight items like socks, undies, and t-shirts it would.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter needed a lot more storage for her insane amount of clothing. We didn't want to add a whole other dresser in her room so we gave this a try. It took less than 10 min to assemble, it fits perfectly in her closet and it has a nice sturdy top to it. I was worried it would be flimsy or look cheap (which is why we planned on putting it in the closet) but it doesn't at all. The drawers (bins) are much bigger than expected and if we ever needed to use it in her room, it would look like a regular dresser.. so, for the price it was definitely a good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for light storage
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to put together and they include everything you need. Parts and hardware are labeled and the instructions/pictures are good. Looks great in my closet. Will be using this for underwear, small purses and sweaters that don’t hang well. Given the price point, it’s perfect. Very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size dresser
reviews.reviewText: I wanted something taller than a normal nightstand to go next to my bed since it's a taller bed. This was the perfect height and the extra drawers come in handy. It looks very nice when put together even though the drawers are material and not wood but they are pretty sturdy. The top is probably compressed wood but looks nice. I would definitely recommend. I ended up buying 2 more in different colors since this particular color sold out for a bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple assembly, sturdy product
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed with the simplicity of set up and the sturdy result! It even came with a screwdriver to install hardware. This is a great set of drawers, especially for this price. I will be buying more in the future when needed. Five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and functional
reviews.reviewText: It is so well made and beautiful! I can store a lot in it. My bathroom looks so much more spacious and put together. Please keep selling these pieces of furniture! I WiLL be buying others! Thank you!
